# .NET API usage instructions

The .NET API is usually types in namespaces or packages starting with `System.*`, `Microsoft.*`, or other well-known .NET libraries.

Documentation for .NET APIs can be found on `https://github.com/dotnet/dotnet-api-docs`. Use the following tools to retrieve relevant information:

* #githubRepo
* #github/github-mcp-server/*
